Title: Call Out Their Leader
Description:
Clearly, you are a hero come to aid us.

Slay the Bataari Tribe in the Kun-Lai Pass to the northwest until the Bataari Fire-Warrior is angered enough to appear.  Dispatch him.
ObjectivesText: Slay 10 Bataari Tribe Members in the Kun-Lai Pass until the Bataari Fire-Warrior appears.  Then kill him.
PortraitGiverText: Slay 10 of the Bataari Tribe Members to anger him into appearing.  Then kill him!
CompletionText: If the war leader of the yaungol is slain, surely our village will be saved and the refugees will be able to return to their farms.
RewardText: We are delivered! I was right about you, $c.
